get.description:
Serve the React app for any /ui/* route to support client-side routing.
This ensures that React Router can handle the routing on the frontend.
Serve the React app for the base /ui route

post.description: Transcribe audio file to text.
Generate audio from text using specified TTS engine.
Generate audio from text using Chatterbox TTS.
Merge multiple audio files into one.
Clean long pauses from the audio based on the provided script.
Upload a file and return its ID.

get.description: Download a file by its ID.
Check the status of a file by its ID.

post.description: Merge multiple videos into one.

Transcode a video to a different format, codec, quality, or resolution.

Supports hardware acceleration with CUDA when available.
Quality levels: 1-3 (low quality/smaller file size), 4-7 (medium quality), 8-10 (high quality/larger file size)

For precise file size control, use the bitrate parameter instead of quality.
Example bitrates: '500k' (low quality), '2M' (medium quality), '5M' (high quality)
Generate a GIF preview from a video.
Generate a captioned video from text and background image.

⚠️ Depcreated - use the generic /video-tools/add-overlay endpoint instead.
Overlay a video on a video with the specified colorkey and intensity
Add an image or video overlay to a video with specified opacity.

get.description:
Extract a frame from a video at a specified timestamp.

Args:
    video_id: Video ID to extract frame from
    timestamp: Optional timestamp in seconds to extract frame from (default: first frame)

parameters.name: timestamp

schema.description: Timestamp in seconds to extract frame from (default: 1.0)
schema.title: Timestamp

parameters.description: Timestamp in seconds to extract frame from (default: 1.0)

get.description: Get information about a video file.
Get information about an audio file.

post.description: Generate a long-form ambient video
Extend an audio file to a specified duration.
Align a script to an audio file and return word timings and segmented chunks.

Generate a revenge story video with TTS audio, captions, and character overlay.
This endpoint accepts JSON body instead of form data.

This endpoint:
1. Generates audio using Kokoro TTS
2. Creates word timings (with alignment for international languages)
3. Generates subtitles
4. Creates character overlay image
5. Generates final revenge video with all components

Create a looping video from an input video.
This will analyze the input video to find a good loop point and create a seamless looping video.
Normalize an audio track to a standard loudness level.

get.description: Get YouTube video transcript by video ID.

post.description: Stitch multiple images into one.
Remove AI-generated artifacts from an image.
Convert PCM audio to WAV format.
Render HTML content to an image.

color.title: Color
color.description: Set the color for which alpha will be set to 0 (full transparency). Use name of the color or hex code (e.g. 'red' or '#ff0000')

similarity.title: Similarity
similarity.description: Set the radius from the key color within which other colors also have full transparency (Default: 0.1)

blend.title: Blend
blend.description: Set how the alpha value for pixels that fall outside the similarity radius is computed (default: 0.1)

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Opacity of the overlay image (0.0 to 1.0, default: 0.4)

audio_id.title: Audio Id
audio_id.description: Audio ID to align script to

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum count per chunk. For 'fixed_words': max words. For 'max_chars': max characters. If None, defaults apply.

lang_code.title: Lang Code
lang_code.description: ISO-639-3 language code for alignment (default: None)

audio_id.title: Audio Id
audio_id.description: Audio ID to clean pauses from

pause_threshold.title: Pause Threshold
pause_threshold.description: Maximum pause duration in seconds before trimming (default: 0.5, minimum: 0.2)

pcm_id.title: Pcm Id
pcm_id.description: ID of the PCM audio file to convert

sample_rate.title: Sample Rate
sample_rate.description: Sample rate of the PCM audio

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Number of audio channels (1 for mono, 2 for stereo)

target_sample_rate.title: Target Sample Rate
target_sample_rate.description: Target sample rate for the WAV audio

video_id.title: Video Id
video_id.description: Video ID to create looping video from

audio_ids.title: Audio Ids
audio_ids.description: Comma-separated list of audio IDs to include in the mix

duration_minutes.title: Duration Minutes
duration_minutes.description: Duration of the mix in minutes, limit: 180 (3 hours) (default: 30)

padding.title: Padding
padding.description: Padding around the text in pixels (default: 100)

subtitle_gap.title: Subtitle Gap
subtitle_gap.description: Gap between title and subtitle in pixels (default: 20)

title_font_size.title: Title Font Size
title_font_size.description: Font size for the title text (default: 200)

title_font_id.title: Title Font Id
title_font_id.description: Font ID for the title text (default: arial)

subtitle_font_size.title: Subtitle Font Size
subtitle_font_size.description: Font size for the subtitle text (default: 100)

subtitle_font_id.title: Subtitle Font Id
subtitle_font_id.description: Font ID for the subtitle text (default: arial)

image_id.title: Image Id
image_id.description: Image ID to use for thumbnail (optional)

video_id.title: Video Id
video_id.description: Video ID to use for thumbnail (optional)

audio_id.title: Audio Id
audio_id.description: Audio ID to create music video for

looping_video_id.title: Looping Video Id
looping_video_id.description: Video ID to use as background for the music video - should be a perfect loop

intro_id.title: Intro Id
intro_id.description: Intro video ID to prepend to the music video (optional)

zoom_effect.title: Zoom Effect
zoom_effect.description: Whether to apply zoom effect to the background video (default: False)

blur_effect.title: Blur Effect
blur_effect.description: Whether to apply blur effect to the background video (default: False)

audio_ids.title: Audio Ids
audio_ids.description: Comma-separated list of audio IDs to include in the playlist

analysis_data.title: Analysis Data
analysis_data.description: Whether to include analysis data in the response (default: False)

duration_minutes.title: Duration Minutes
duration_minutes.description: Duration to extend the audio to in minutes, minimum: 10, maximum: 180 (3 hours)

url.title: Url
url.description: URL of the video to extract frame from

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Number of frames to extract from the video (default: 5)

length_seconds.title: Length Seconds
length_seconds.description: Length of the video in seconds (optional)

stitch.title: Stitch
stitch.description: Whether to stitch the frames into a single image (default: False)

text.title: Text
text.description: Text to generate video from, or to use it as alignment with the provided audio_id

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code for STT (optional, e.g. 'en', 'fr', 'de'), defaults to None (auto-detect language if audio_id is provided)

alignment_language_code.title: Alignment Language Code
alignment_language_code.description: ISO-639-3 language code for TTS alignment (optional, e.g. 'eng', 'fra', 'deu'), defaults to None

font_id.title: Font Id
font_id.description: Font ID to use for captions (optional)

image_effect.title: Image Effect
image_effect.description: Effect to apply to the background image, options: ken_burns, pan, still (default: 'ken_burns')

caption_config_line_count.title: Caption Config Line Count
caption_config_line_count.description: Number of lines per subtitle segment (default: 1)

caption_config_font_name.title: Caption Config Font Name
caption_config_font_name.description: Font family name (default: 'EB Garamond', see the available fonts form the /fonts endpoint)

caption_config_font_bold.title: Caption Config Font Bold
caption_config_font_bold.description: Whether to use bold font (default: True)

caption_config_font_italic.title: Caption Config Font Italic
caption_config_font_italic.description: Whether to use italic font (default: false)

sample_audio_id.title: Sample Audio Id
sample_audio_id.description: Sample audio ID for voice cloning

sample_audio_file.title: Sample Audio File
sample_audio_file.description: Sample audio file for voice cloning

exaggeration.title: Exaggeration
exaggeration.description: Exaggeration factor for voice cloning, default: 0.5

cfg_weight.title: Cfg Weight
cfg_weight.description: CFG weight for voice cloning, default: 0.5

chunk_silence_ms.title: Chunk Silence Ms
chunk_silence_ms.description: Silence duration between chunks in milliseconds (default: 350)

reverb_effect.title: Reverb Effect
reverb_effect.description: Whether to apply reverb effect to the generated audio (default: False)

video_id.title: Video Id
video_id.description: Video ID to generate GIF preview from

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: Start time in seconds for the GIF preview (default: 0.0)

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration in seconds (1-6) for the GIF preview (default: 3.0)

reverb_effect.title: Reverb Effect
reverb_effect.description: Whether to apply reverb effect to the generated audio (default: False)

video_id.title: Video Id
video_id.description: Video ID to generate ambient video from

audio_id.title: Audio Id
audio_id.description: (duplicate) Music ID for the video background music (optional)

music_id.title: Music Id
music_id.description: Music ID to use for the video background music (optional)

dialogue_ids.title: Dialogue Ids
dialogue_ids.description: Comma-separated list of dialogue audio IDs to overlay on the ambient video (optional)

dialogue_pause_seconds.title: Dialogue Pause Seconds
dialogue_pause_seconds.description: Pause in seconds between dialogue clips (default: 0.5)

music_volume.title: Music Volume
music_volume.description: Volume for the music (0.0 to 1.0, default: 1)

duration_minutes.title: Duration Minutes
duration_minutes.description: Duration of the ambient video in minutes (default: 10), minimum: 10, maximum: 180

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the video (default: 1920), maximum is 1920

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the video (default: 1080), maximum is 1080

ambient_sounds.title: Ambient Sounds
ambient_sounds.description: Comma-separated list of ambient sounds and their volume in the format: 'TYPE:VOLUME,TYPE:VOLUME', e.g. 'rain:1.0,wind:0.5'.

image_id.title: Image Id
image_id.description: ID of the image to unaize

enhance_color.title: Enhance Color
enhance_color.description: Strength of the color enhancement (0-2). 0 means black and white, 1 means no change, 2 means full color enhancement

noise_strength.title: Noise Strength
noise_strength.description: Strength of the noise to apply to the image (0-100)

audio_id.title: Audio Id
audio_id.description: Audio ID to use as reference for duration resizing (optional)

speed_up_limit_percent.title: Speed Up Limit Percent
speed_up_limit_percent.description: Maximum speed up limit as a decimal (default: 0.25 for 25%)

slow_down_limit_percent.title: Slow Down Limit Percent
slow_down_limit_percent.description: Maximum slow down limit as a decimal (default: 0.25 for 25%)

remove_audio.title: Remove Audio
remove_audio.description: Whether to remove audio from the output video (default: True)

audio_ids.title: Audio Ids
audio_ids.description: Comma-separated list of audio IDs to merge

pause.title: Pause
pause.description: Pause duration between audios in seconds (default: 0.5)

video_ids.title: Video Ids
video_ids.description: List of video IDs to merge - 150 max

normalize.title: Normalize
normalize.description: Whether to normalize the FPS, video codec and audio codec before merging (default: True)

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the rendered HTML page

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the rendered HTML page

image_urls.title: Image Urls
image_urls.description: Comma-separated list of image URLs to stitch together

max_width.title: Max Width
max_width.description: Maximum width of the final stitched image

max_height.title: Max Height
max_height.description: Maximum height of the final stitched image

codec.title: Codec
codec.description: Video codec to use: libx264 (default), h264, libx265, h265, hevc, or mp4

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Quality level from 1 (lowest quality, smallest file) to 10 (highest quality, largest file), default: 5

bitrate.title: Bitrate
bitrate.description: Target bitrate (e.g., '1000k', '2M'). If specified, overrides quality parameter for more precise file size control

url.title: Url
url.description: URL of the file to upload (optional)

RevengeStoryVideoRequest.title: RevengeStoryVideoRequest
RevengeStoryVideoRequest.description: Request model for revenge story video generation
